GSD.description:
hwmon: (w83793) Fix NULL pointer dereference by removing unnecessary structure field

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.71 by commit 7c4fd5de39f273626a2b0f3a446d2cc85cd47616. For more details please see the references link.
